front.title: Transition from RFC2131-style to RFC3315-style Client Identifiers for DHCPv4

abstract.t: This document explores ways for a node that is configured using DHCP and that has in the past been configured using one of the client identification schemes described in RFC2131 and RFC2132 to make the transition to using the identification scheme described in RFC3315 and in draft-ietf-dhc-3315-id-for-v4.txt.
